dataChanged.description:
Occurs when the data has changed.
 Function takes first argument evt and second argument ui.
 Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the barcode widget.
 Use ui.newData to obtain the new data.

errorMessageDisplaying.description:
Occurs when an error has happened.
 Function takes first argument evt and second argument ui.
 Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the barcode widget.
 Use ui.errorMessage to get or set the error message that is to be shown.

applicationIndicator.description:
Gets or sets the Application Indicator assigned to identify the specification concerned by AIM International.
 The value is respected only when the Fnc1Mode is set to Industry. Its value may take the form of any single Latin alphabetic character from the set {a - z, A - Z} or a two-digit number.

width.description: The width of the barcode. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

height.description: The height of the barcode. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

backingBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the backing of the barcode.

backingOutline.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the backing.

backingStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the backing outline.

barBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the background of the bars.

barsFillMode.description: Gets or sets a value which specifies how the grid fills within the barcode control dimensions.

valueOptions.name: fillSpace
valueOptions.description: FillSpace mode ensures that the barcode grid fills the control dimensions.

valueOptions.name: ensureEqualSize
valueOptions.description: EnsureEqualSize mode ensures that every grid column/row has the same pixels number width/height. The sum of all columns/rows pixels may be less than the width/height of the control.

data.description: Gets or sets the data value.

eciHeaderDisplayMode.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the ECI header.

valueOptions.name: hide
valueOptions.description: Hide the header.

valueOptions.name: show
valueOptions.description: Show the header.

eciNumber.description:
Each Extended Channel Interpretation (ECI) is designated by a six-digit assignment number: 000000 - 999999.
 The default value depends on the loaded encodings. The default is ECI 000003 (representing ISO/IEC 8859-1) if the ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set is loaded. Otherwise the default value is 000026 (representing UTF-8).

encodingMode.description: Gets or sets the encoding mode for compaction of the QR Code symbol data. The default value is undefined if the Shift_JIS encoding is loaded. Otherwise the default value is byte.

valueOptions.name: undefined
valueOptions.description: When Undefined encoding mode is set, the QR code barcode internally switches between modes as necessary in order to achieve the most efficient conversion of data into a binary string.

valueOptions.name: numeric
valueOptions.description: Numeric mode encodes data from decimal digit set (0-9). Normally 3 data characters are represented by 10 bits.

valueOptions.name: alphanumeric
valueOptions.description: Alphanumerc mode encodes data from a set of 45 characters (digits 0-9, upper case letters A-Z, nine other characters: space, $ % * + _ . / : ). Normally two input characters are represented by 11 bits.

valueOptions.name: byte
valueOptions.description: In Byte mode the data is encoded at 8 bits per character. The character set of the Byte encoding mode is byte data (by default it is ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set).

valueOptions.name: kanji
valueOptions.description: The Kanji mode efficiently encodes Kanji characters in accordance with the Shift JIS system based on JIS X 0208. Each two-byte character value is compactedd to a 13-bit binary codeword.

errorCorrectionLevel.description: Gets or sets the error correction level of the QR Code symbol.

valueOptions.name: low
valueOptions.description: Low error correction level allows recovery of 7% of the symbol codewords.

valueOptions.name: medium
valueOptions.description: Medium error correction level allows recovery of 15% of the symbol codewords.

valueOptions.name: quartil
valueOptions.description: Quartil error correction level allows recovery of 25% of the symbol codewords.

valueOptions.name: high
valueOptions.description: High error correction level allows recovery of 30% of the symbol codewords.

errorMessageText.description: Gets or sets the message text displayed when some error occurs.

fnc1Mode.description: Gets or sets the FNC1 mode indicator which identifies symbols encoding messages formatted according to specific predefined industry or application specificatoins.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: Do not use any Fnc1 symbols, i.e. the data is not identified according to specific predefined industry or application specifications.

valueOptions.name: gs1
valueOptions.description: Uses Fnc1 symbol in the first position of the character in Code 128 symbols and designates data formatted in accordance with the GS1 General Specification.

valueOptions.name: industry
valueOptions.description: Uses Fnc1 symbol in the second position of the character in Code 128 symbols and designates data formatted in accordance with a specific indystry application previously agreed with AIM Inc.

font.description: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.

fontBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the label font.

sizeVersion.description: Gets or sets the size version of the QR Code symbol.

valueOptions.name: undefined
valueOptions.description: If set, the QR code barcode sets internally the smallest version that will accommodate the data.

valueOptions.name: version1
valueOptions.description: Version1 defines size of 21x21 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version2
valueOptions.description: Version2 defines size of 25x25 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version3
valueOptions.description: Version3 defines size of 29x29 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version4
valueOptions.description: Version4 defines size of 33x33 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version5
valueOptions.description: Version5 defines size of 37x37 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version6
valueOptions.description: Version6 defines size of 41x41 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version7
valueOptions.description: Version7 defines size of 45x45 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version8
valueOptions.description: Version8 defines size of 49x49 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version9
valueOptions.description: Version9 defines size of 53x53 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version10
valueOptions.description: Version10 defines size of 57x57 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version11
valueOptions.description: Version11 defines size of 61x61 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version12
valueOptions.description: Version12 defines size of 65x65 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version13
valueOptions.description: Version13 defines size of 69x69 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version14
valueOptions.description: Version14 defines size of 73x73 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version15
valueOptions.description: Version15 defines size of 77x77 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version16
valueOptions.description: Version16 defines size of 81x81 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version17
valueOptions.description: Version17 defines size of 85x85 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version18
valueOptions.description: Version18 defines size of 89x89 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version19
valueOptions.description: Version19 defines size of 93x93 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version20
valueOptions.description: Version20 defines size of 97x97 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version21
valueOptions.description: Version21 defines size of 101x101 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version22
valueOptions.description: Version22 defines size of 105x105 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version23
valueOptions.description: Version23 defines size of 109x109 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version24
valueOptions.description: Version24 defines size of 113x113 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version25
valueOptions.description: Version25 defines size of 117x117 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version26
valueOptions.description: Version26 defines size of 121x121 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version27
valueOptions.description: Version27 defines size of 125x125 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version28
valueOptions.description: Version28 defines size of 129x129 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version29
valueOptions.description: Version29 defines size of 133x133 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version30
valueOptions.description: Version30 defines size of 137x137 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version31
valueOptions.description: Version31 defines size of 141x141 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version32
valueOptions.description: Version32 defines size of 145x145 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version33
valueOptions.description: Version33 defines size of 149x149 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version34
valueOptions.description: Version34 defines size of 153x153 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version35
valueOptions.description: Version35 defines size of 157x157 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version36
valueOptions.description: Version36 defines size of 161x161 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version37
valueOptions.description: Version37 defines size of 165x165 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version38
valueOptions.description: Version38 defines size of 169x169 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version39
valueOptions.description: Version39 defines size of 173x173 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: version40
valueOptions.description: Version40 defines size of 177x177 modules for the symbol.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: The content preserves its nominal dimensions. When using fill, as the content's height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the image is not preserved which is why using this value is not recommended when the barcode is used for reading (for reading, use either none or uniform).

valueOptions.name: fill
valueOptions.description: The content is resized to fill the destination’s dimensions.

valueOptions.name: uniform
valueOptions.description: The content is resized to fit the destination’s dimensions while its native aspect ratio is preserved.

valueOptions.name: uniformToFill
valueOptions.description: The content is resized to fill the destination’s dimensions completely while it preserves its native aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of the destination rectangle differs from that of the source, the excessive source content will be cut off.

widthToHeightRatio.description: Gets or sets the width (XDimension) to height (YDimension) ratio. It accepts only positive values. This property does not apply for the QR barcode.

xDimension.description: Gets or sets the X-dimension (narrow element width) for a symbol in mm. It accepts values from 0.01 to 100.
